name: Einheriar
description:
"Einheriar" is a tower defense game where you must continuously collect coins to upgrade your warriors and equipment. Each warrior excels in different weapons, talents, and passive abilities.

You can use your imagination to create weapon combinations! For example, a bow can not only shoot arrows, but also shoot out other weapons as if they were arrows!


Throwing out different weapons can cause different debuff to the monsters, such as allergies.
Also, make sure not to let the warriors use a weapon with a negative proficiency, as this will greatly increase your difficulty!


Game Content:
·6 classes: Archer, Mage, Spearman, Swordsman, Thrower, Idiot (without damage-causing weapon)
·Over 40 warriors
·Over 40 passive abilities
·Over 80 pieces of equipment and over 70 weapons
·Over 150 monsters
·7 debuffs: Bleeding, Stun, Burn, Freeze, Slow, Poison, Allergy.
·Over 150 levels and one final level.

Good luck!
